name: Caligo (itch) (Hexanonym)
description:
Caligo is a horror themed 3D first person puzzle, escape room type of game with a heavily dark art style. The assets used within the game have nearly all been gathered from opengameart.org and are free to use. Note that since this was my first attempt at creating a game utilizing the Godot engine, and due to my prior inexperience using game engines (Pure code / CS background) there may exist some "Novel" solutions that would otherwise seem unorganized and messy.  The game is rather hard to complete and requires discovering tricky hidden elements and messages.

I uploaded the Godot project file and the source code alongside a compiled version for Windows for anyone to enjoy.

This game was created in approximately 96 Hours with zero prior knowledge of the Godot engine and was intended as a learning experience.

Tips are much appreciated as I am hoping to make a career as a game developer!
